subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

LINDSAY LOHAN'S WILD WEEKEND!
From her DUI
arrest after a car crash to her collapse outside a club, has
Lindsay finally hit rock bottom? Who's to blame for her out of
control behavior? The startling story and pictures on TV's most
provocative entertainment news show. 

LINDSAY'S
FATHER SPEAKS OUT!
Lindsay and her dad haven't spoken
in years, but now he's reaching out, saying he wants to help
her. Michael Lohan is a recovering alcoholic and has spent some
time behind bars -- what does he have to offer her at this
point? Michael Lohan in his own words, tonight on Showbiz
Tonight.

NO MORE ROSIE ON "THE VIEW"
It's the first post-Rosie O'Donnell day on "The View"
-- what Elisabeth said about their now infamous feud -- and
Barbara Walters weighs in as well! So what happens next? Can
the show survive without Rosie? Showbiz Tonight has all the
angles covered.

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE
DAY:
Lindsay Lohan's wild weekend: Do you feel sorry
for her?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT. 

SEND
US A VIDEO EMAIL!
Send your response to the Question
Of The Day on video. Look into your camera and tell us what you
think. Responses must be no longer than 30 seconds. To send
your video email, go to cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your video
responses on "Showbiz Tonight" at 11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN Headline
Prime.
